title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 113: Featuring Scott Hartnell
description:
On this week's episode, the boys are joined by Scott Hartnell who retired from the NHL this week after 17 seasons. Whit and Biz talk to Scott about his career, his time in Philly, his farts and a ton more. The guys break down the opening night in the NHL, talk about the Chiclets Bump with Auston Matthews and Jack Eichel and much more. The boys also touch on Tom Wilson's 20-game suspension and give their thoughts on it.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
